sentences.en: A copy of the document is hereto appended.
sentences.cn: 在此附上本文件的副本。

sentences.en: A The Parties hereto reach an agreement in writing; or.
sentences.cn: A通过双方共同书面协议; 或.

sentences.en: Both parties hereto shall observe and comply with regulations concerning labor safety and hygiene.
sentences.cn: 双方必须严格遵守并配合劳工安全卫生有关法令及规定.

sentences.en: IN WITNESS WHEREOF the Parties hereto have executed this Agreement and year first above written.
sentences.cn: 作为见证人,双方在上述日期年月日执行此协议.

sentences.en: Parties hereto may revise or supplement through negotiation matters not mentioned herein.
sentences.cn: 本合同如有未尽事宜,双方可协商修订或补充.

sentences.en: Subject to mutual agreement between the parties hereto , no interest is payable.
sentences.cn: 根据有关方面共同协议而无须支付利息.

sentences.en: Terms of Delivery are included in the Delivery Schedule in Appendix No.3 hereto.
sentences.cn: 交货期限按照这里的附件3交货进度表确定.

sentences.en: The Arbitration award will be final and Binding upon all parties hereto.
sentences.cn: 仲裁的裁决将是终局的并对各方都有约束力.

sentences.en: The award of this arbitration final and binding upon the Parties hereto.
sentences.cn: 仲裁裁决是终局性的,对双方都有约束力.

sentences.en: The correspondence attached hereto form part of the Contract.
sentences.cn: 合同文件以及其来往文件均应被视为本合同的一部份.

sentences.en: The Schedules hereto form an integral part of this Agreement.
sentences.cn: 附录是这个协议的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: This Agreement constitutes a legally binding hereto.
sentences.cn: 此合约是具有法律约束力.

sentences.en: This Agreement is in duplicate, one original for each party hereto.
sentences.cn: 本协议一式二份, 各方圴持有一份正本.

sentences.en: We attach hereto our enquiry list for your reference.
sentences.cn: 兹附询价单一纸供你方参考.

sentences.en: We attach hereto two extra copy of invoice covering our shipment.
sentences.cn: 关于所装运货物,兹附寄发票副本两份.

trans.tran_en: to this place, thing, matter, document, etc
